description: Gets a summary of current and previous streams for a specified channel in your account, in the AWS region where the API request is processed.

parameters.name: channelArn
parameters.description: Channel ARN used to filter the list.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more streams than maxResults, use nextToken in the request to get the next set.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: Time when the channel went offline. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string. For live streams, this is NULL.

nested_items.name: hasErrorEvent
nested_items.description: If true, this stream encountered a quota breach or failure.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Time when the channel went live. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string.

nested_items.name: streamId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for a live or previously live stream in the specified channel.
